title: paripaahi dhayakara
sahitya:
paripAhi dayAkara dEvasEnAvara hara gaurIkumAra shrI parikhApurEshvara

anupallavi

 durita samhArakara varada madhurAkAra hariNAnka vadana shrI vaLLI manOhara

caraNam

 vrndArakAdi bhakta vrnda sadArAdhita kundEndu hima shvEta sundara paripUta 
vandAru mandAraka santApa nAsha vrta skanda shaNmukha vana tulasIdalArcita
